metadata.feature_description: Add new users to the system

steps.action: Navigate to Users panel and click Add User button
steps.expected: Create user form should open with all required fields
steps.actual: Create user form opened with First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Authorized toggle, Random Password toggle, Password, Confirm Password fields, and Save/Cancel buttons

steps.action: Fill form with valid data: First Name=Claude, Last Name=TestCreate, User Name=claudetestcreate2026, Email=claudetestcreate2026@test.com, Password=TestPass123!
steps.expected: Form should accept all valid input data
steps.actual: Form accepted all input data, password strength indicator showed 'strong'

steps.expected: User should be created successfully and appear in user list
steps.actual: Success message 'User created successfully.' appeared, new user 'Claude TestCreate' appeared at top of user list, total entries increased from 20 to 21

steps.action: Open create user form and click Save without entering any data
steps.expected: Validation errors should appear for all required fields
steps.actual: Red exclamation mark error indicators appeared next to all required fields: First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password, and Confirm Password

steps.action: Fill form with valid data except Email Address which is set to 'invalid-email-format', then click Save
steps.expected: Validation error should appear for invalid email format
steps.actual: Red exclamation mark error indicator appeared next to the Email Address field indicating invalid format

steps.action: Fill form with valid data but use existing username 'claudetestcreate2026', then click Save
steps.expected: Error message should appear indicating username already exists
steps.actual: Error notification appeared with message 'The username is already in use.' and user was not created

steps.action: Review code and verify button visibility as superuser (admin)
steps.expected: Add User button should be visible only to users with isAdmin=true OR ADD_USER permission
steps.actual: Code review confirmed canAddUser() function returns true if settings.isAdmin OR settings.permissions.ADD_USER. Button was visible and functional for superuser account

observations: The canAddUser permission helper at permissionHelpers.js:4-6 checks for isAdmin OR ADD_USER permission
The Create User button at index.jsx:188-198 is conditionally rendered based on canAddUser() result
Password field includes real-time strength indicator showing weak/medium/strong
Random Password toggle can auto-generate password when enabled (not explicitly tested)
Send An Email To New User checkbox is available for notifying new users
